description: A small modification that allows you to present the story in the game as an open book or stack of parchment pages. Inspired by the Owlcat Pathfinder: Kingmaker game.   Based on the original works by Xbozon(https://github.com/Xbozon/storyteller) and extentions provided by Benjaneer(https://github.com/Benjaneer/storyteller-addon-singlesheet).
title: StoryTeller 2
